name: Next Door Solutions
description: Emergency shelter, counseling, legal help in Santa Clara County
fullDescription: Next Door Solutions provides comprehensive support services in Santa Clara County including crisis intervention, emergency shelter, counseling, legal help, and economic empowerment programs.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24-hour crisis hotline
- Emergency shelter
- Counseling services
- Legal advocacy
- Children's services
- Economic empowerment
- Support groups
- Multilingual services
howToGetIt:
1. Call crisis line: 408-279-2962
2. Speak with advocate
3. Receive safety planning
4. Access shelter and services
5. Connect with ongoing support
6. All services free and confidential
keywords: Next Door Solutions, Santa Clara County, San Jose, crisis line, emergency shelter, counseling, legal advocacy, economic empowerment, multilingual, 408-279-2962
